verses.1: Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawl khat pialin, zuau thu gente le dawi thu a kigente a zuih nading uh Kha Siangtho in teltakin a gen hi.
verses.2: Tua bang zuau thuhilhnate pen zuau genin mi a khem, sik em sa tawh tat gawp bangin a lungsim un a hoih le a hoih lo a khen thei nawn loteʼ kam panin hong ging khia ding hi.
verses.3: Tua bang mite in zi neih le pasal neih ding le an pawl khat nek ding hoih lo hi, ci uh hi. Ahi zongin thu umin, thuman thutak a thei mite in lungdamna ko-in a nek dingin Pasian in tua ante a bawl ahi hi.
verses.4: Pasianʼ bawl sa na khempeuh a hoih hi a, nial loin, lungdamna pulakin san ding ahi hi.
verses.5: Pasianʼ thu le thungetna hang tawh tuate a hoih a suak ahi hi.
verses.6: Nang in na zuih sa upna thu le thuhilhna man na zuih kawmin hih ka hong thugente, i sanggamte kiangah na gen nakleh Khris Jesuʼ nasem a hoih khat na hi ding hi.
verses.7: Pasianʼ thu tawh a kituak lo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasianʼ deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawh nadingin na kisin in.
verses.8: Pumpi kisekin kisinna manpha hi. Ahi zongin kha thu ah kisekin kisinna pen tu hun laitak le a hong tung ding hunah nuntakna hong pia thei ahih manin manpha zaw lai hi,
verses.9: ci-a kigen pen a man taktak thu hi a, umin sin dingin a kilawm thu ahi hi.
verses.10: A diakdiakin ei thu umte in mi khempeuh a Hon khia, a nungta Pasian muangin lamen ihih manin nakpi takin hanciamin na a sem ihi hi.
verses.11: Ka hong gen sa thute na hilh sawn in.
verses.12: Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin miteʼ simmawh dingin na om kei inla, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna le sianthona ah thu um miteʼ etteh dingin na om in.
verses.13: Kei ka hong pai matengin mipi mai ah Lai Siangtho simna, a khiatna genna le hanthotnate ah tavuan na la in.
verses.14: Kamsangteʼ thugennate le upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hih theih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.
verses.15: Mi khempeuh in na khantohna hong muh theih nadingin hih thute limtakin ngaihsun inla, hahkatin na sem in.
verses.16: Na gamtatna le na thuhilhnate ah hoihtakin kidawmin om lecin nangmah a kipan na thugen a za mite adingin phattuamna om ding ahih manin na nasepna ah hoihtakin om in.
